data.title: Out of Business
data.text: Don't go there because they closed up the restaurant. Sad to see it leave because my husband and I used to go there for iced tea after working out in the morning. Was a nice place, especially in the summer when we used to sit outside.

data.title: Average food
data.text: I have been always a fan of Panera as they have some good vegetarian options. But this time the experience was not good. Ordered for Veggie Sandwich and it was OK. Grilled Cheese sandwich was good. I was most disappointed with the Ginger Hibiscus Tea. It was tasteless with no flavor of Ginger in it.

data.title: Worst Panera service
data.text: I've been to several Panera Bread's across the country and by far this Panera has the worst service. The manager on duty has zero regard for how long people wait in line or how long they have to wait for their food. It is not uncommon to wait 20 minutes or more for a simple pastry or bagel. This is not been a terribly high traffic area either. If it wasn't for the fact that my children survive on their muffins on some mornings I would absolutely never return to this location! In addition, panera food tends to be terribly overpriced.

data.title: Nice place for morning coffee
data.text: Nice place to enjoy a morning coffee at one of the outdoor tables. However, it could use a few more umbrellas. Love the wild blueberry scone.

data.title: Pat era Breas
data.text: Panera Bread has great soup and sandwich combos.  Everything is freshly made to order.  Outstanding bread!
